title: Dash Compact Air Fryer 1.2 L Electric Air Fryer Oven Cooker with Temperature Control, Non Stick Fry Basket, Recipe Guide + Auto Shut off Feature - Grey
features:
Make sure this fits
                by entering your model number.

Healthier fried food: Dash compact air fryer uses aircrisp technology (instead of oil) to help reduce added fat by 70-80%, without sacrificing the flavor of your fried food (no more residual smell hours after you’ve eaten)

Quick + easy: short on time? simply load the 1.6 qt capacity fryer basket, set the temp, and set the timer. Your food comes out crispy, guaranteed, every time. And in less time than it takes to pre-heat your oven, making it more Energy efficient

Safer: the auto-shut off function prevents overcooking, and the cool touch housing and handle makes it safer to use. It’s so simple, even your kids can use it! (bonus, the nonstick fryer basket is dishwasher safe for even easier cleanup!)

Versatile: this is the perfect appliance for picky eaters, large families, or those who have busy schedules. Appetizers to desserts, 1 dozen chicken wings, 1lb French fries, even baked goods, and all within minutes of setting the timer - it couldn’t be easier!

Compact + lightweight: half the Weight of a standard fryer, the Dash air fryer is your must-have for that first apartment, smaller kitchen, college dorm life, or camper/RV traveling. Plus, its sleek design and trendy color options will accent any kitchen space

reviews.reviewText: I have used this a couple times, it's really a cute product, not too big, works well. It does have the plastic smell when in use but I think it is getting less and may go away completely. I have made chicken thighs which I had to turn over half way since the skin was getting too dark but I think that was because of the seasoning I used that was burning but the skin was crispy and the chicken super juicy! I also have made frozen breaded chicken tenders (the oven ready kind) they came out nice and crispy and browned. I got this because I live alone and hate using the oven and heating the house for a single serving and I hate toaster ovens since they take forever to cook in. This is perfect for one person.

reviews.reviewTitle: This little gadget is awesome! I purchased it for my office at work
reviews.reviewText: This little gadget is awesome! I purchased it for my office at work, as I used to cook my sweet potato fries in a convection oven where I would have to go into the break room multiple times to flip my fries and reset the timer for additional cooking. This air fryer has made my life so much simpler and has eliminated all of that! My frozen sweet potato fries now only take 15 min to cook, I can keep the fryer in my office, and after about 5 uses, I can say it cooks very well and gives my fries (and tots) a delicious crisp fried taste. I have already encouraged several of my co-workers to purchase one, and I'll probably buy a larger one for my house down the road. This size is ideal for one or two servings, so if you are feeding more people, I would recommend a larger air fryer. Clean-up also couldn't be easier! It's adorable and a simple tool, I am very happy with my purchase!
Basket insert tray finish is coming off after only 1 month of use☹️

reviews.reviewTitle: I've always loved wings and over the years have tried all the ...
reviews.reviewText: I've always loved wings and over the years have tried all the methods to make a good wing - over, microwave then oven, crock pot, crock pot then oven, grill, etc. yet, all I managed to do was go through a ton of batteries for my smoke detector. I figured - what the heck? I'll give this a try...and boy am I glad I did. I covered 8 wing halves with self-rising flour and set it at 375 fro 25 minutes - turning them half way through. Then covered them in my favorite sauce mixture and shazam!! Perfect wings! I should have tried one of these things years ago. Easy cleanup too. Highly recommended if you like great wings without all the mess.

Great little air fryer! Perfect if cooking for one or two people. Would not recommend if cooking for more than 2 or 3 people. Little tip you have to turn the timer on for the air fryer to actually turn on.

I love this - it does not take up too much room - its super easy to use ive made - chicken- shrimp- fish - turkey burgers
all have been delicious — THIS IS NOT BIG ENOUGH FOR MORE THAN 2 PEOPLE — perfect - love it

Great for frying chicken! I love fried food but not good for you...anyway I fried two large chicken thighs with no breading, the chicken skin was super crispy and all the grease was in the bottom of the cooker. It is small but I’m single so perfect for me. I’ve only had it a few weeks but definitely a great item. And I love the color! The only down side for “those of a certain age “ the numbers on the timer are hard to see.

Love this guy. Spray a little Pam in there, cook a
cutlet,wipe it clean: a bachelors dream!

This thing works fast. It will cook a potato faster than an oven. It will crisp sliced potatoes faster than an oven. It has cooked eggs in its shell. I've toasted my bagels in it.
It roasts my bell peppers to perfection within 10 minutes. It has so much potential and still trying out different recipes.
In essence, it is a toaster and oven in one. No need to wash pans. Easy to clean. I cannot complain. Best purchase ever.

reviews.reviewTitle: You’d swear the wings were fried!
reviews.reviewText: PERFECT little air fryer for one, maybe two, people! Heats wonderfully and cooks foods super fast. Chicken wings are my favorite to cook in this amazing little contraption and you would swear they were fried! I’m hooked. I’ve already recommended to a few friends.

Love this little DASH air fryer. Household of 2 - so perfect size and the food comes out great. I've tried several items and cooking chicken breasts is my favorite so far. Fish is great too as well as tater-tots & fries. I'm feeling better about the way I am able to cook healthier food as I use no oil and do not fry at all on my stove top. I bought several colors of the DASH for family gifts with rave reviews. Retired parents, Sis with empty nest, and Son with small daughters who love the ease of cooking and cleanup - so easy with a rinse or even tossing in the dishwasher's top rack. Would like to say that the design is so cute on my kitchen cabinet and the food comes out nicely browned on the outside and not overcooked on the inside. Such a good purchasing decision for me :)

I wanted an alternative to deep frying and decided to get the DASH rapid air fryer. It works great without the need of using so much oil. Works as advertised and is a prefect size. Even my awesome chef of a boyfriend loves it! Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewTitle: Can it be replaced by seller?
reviews.reviewText: I really liked the food prepared with the Dash. But the Teflon began flaking off the tray (and this flaking is increasing); and these spots are starting to rust. And now it has begun to flake off the bottom of the basket. If this is not everyone’s experience, I would like a replacement. If it is a common occurrence, I don’t want it for my food!

We tried the zucchini chip recipe but were very disappointed. This cooker holds such a small amount that the two person amount (3 cups) had to be done in multiple batches. So by the time the recipe amount was finished the first batch was cold. Go for the bigger size unless you are a household of one or less.

reviews.reviewTitle: Didn’t stay on from the first use
reviews.reviewText: I have used this three times. And all three times, I have had it shut off after only a few minutes. When it shuts off, I have to pull out the basket and insert it again several times before it will turn on again. I believe there is an issue with the sensor or switch that turns on the heat. I am returning it.
I do not normally bother with writing reviews. But this little device is amazing. Easiest grilled cheese ever. Cleaning the unit is a breeze..

reviews.reviewTitle: Just not what it claims to do
reviews.reviewText: Very interesting idea, but unsuccessful and not usable. You are told not to stack items, so with this unit you can cook four shrimp or three onion rings or one small cheese sandwich - at @10 minutes for each item. Shrimp and onion rings have no fried batter coating, cooked with a fluffy flour coating. I assume the ad photos were prepared with a normal deep fat fryer. Would be great if it worked, it doesn't. Don't recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Extremely useful product: Compact and Effective!
reviews.reviewText:
Okay, so this is dope!!

Extremely useful product. After unwrapping it today I cut up some potatoes to try making homemade French fries. The timer worked as promise the temperature was easy to set. These were the crispiest fries I have ever had, and to mention they were made with no grease!

The cleanup and reuse is easy and I have to say my family and kids love it. I would highly recommend buying this item as a healthy alternative to frying: especially now that spring is here and trying to get back in shape and not giving up fried foods.

I had to come back to this after day two with this item. I just used it to make breakfast: taco omelet with spinach, potatoes, tomatoes, and a dash of cheese. I am very impressed with the ease of use and the fact that the clean-up is so easy. The little unit is also not so bulky so that storing it doesn't require a lot of real-estate. The color is also cool too: my mother in law came in and immediately said what the heck is that! Great conversational piece. Good Job Dash on this one!

I love my compact air fryer; however when I received it, it was missing one of the rubber gaskets on the “feet.” I called customer service (took me 3 days to get thru) and spoke to someone who said they would send it right out. It’s now been three weeks and I still haven’t received it. When I tried to contact customer service I get a voice message that says they are closed for the evening and they will open at 7 tomorrow morning. It’s 8:30 am. Not sure where they are located but so far their customer service is very much lacking.
Works well. When you first open it prepare yourself for a strong chemical smell. Washed in the dishwasher before using. Helped some.

I thought this would be quick and easy to do meals for two people. When I got down to it, you put 1 layer of 1/4 fries onA the bottom of the basket (10 fit), cook 10 minutes shake up and cook 10 more minutes. It would take 2-3 hours to cook one large potato cut up into fries. 400 degree for that long not energy efficient. Fries can be made in the oven with less time and done all at once. I looked at the frying times and realized this is an energy and time drain. I thought it would be fast and easy. You can't leave it running, so there is no plus to using it that I know of. So disappointed.

I have use this item once and is now broken the fan which makes this an air fryer does not work and therefore makes having this machine pointless. I was skeptical of buying one because it was such a good price but many of my friends have air fryers I love them however I did not have the same experience and I’m very disappointed :-(

I LOVE this product! Works great. You would think I fried the potato fries I made and I also put turkey burgers inside there and it worked beautifully. I’m so happy with this purchase. However I’m still going to buy a bigger air fryer. This one is cute for two people!

We love how convenient our Dash air fryer is! We have cooked so much inside of it, bacon, wings, French fries, veggies, sausage patties, sausages, we even reheat leftovers. I’m on a low carb diet and I have used it so much/ my only complaint is that the basket has scraped off so you can see the black non stick paint has chipped off a lot. So that means I ate it since it stuck to my food. So now I use parchment papers to line the basket. Which is an extra step but it’s still an amazing kitchen gadget.

reviews.reviewTitle: Stylish design to leave on the counter!
reviews.reviewText: I love this cute little air fryer! It was bigger than I thought it would be but it still fits nicely on my counter. The color matches my kitchen and I love the design! Works like a charm for chicken (skin on bone in breast fits perfect!), potatoes, fish sticks, hot dogs,etc... I feel like it is my little convenient convection oven.. Super easy to clean. I love it!

Loving it so far. Experimented first with some boxes somosas , burned them . Too hot, too long . So far egg rolls and Egyptian goodies came out fine . I lightly oiled them first , maybe that’s why they came out good . Instructions doesn’t say to coat with oily

reviews.reviewTitle: She said it was terrible. She followed the cooking guide with their recipe
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a gift for my mom. She said it was terrible. She followed the cooking guide with their recipe, the food didn’t cook evenly, the batter literally fell off the onions... a total waste of money.

Zero stars! Used only once to cook 2 pieces of chicken. Halfway through the cooking process the machine stopped working. I thought that it may have over heated (not sure why it would have though since I operated it on my kitchen island so it wouldn't be near a wall and it was operating within the set amount of time to prepare chicken according to the instructions) so I unplugged it and let it cool down. Welp, that did not work. My only regret is waiting to use it after the return period. Lesson learned.
Great for a couple. Not very big. Love the fries. Quicker the the oven. Haven't tried rewarming food yet

Absolute LOVE this air fryer. I originally purchased the grey color, but I was dying to get this one because it matches my kitchen. I am beyond happy with the color. The air fryer itself works great and is super easy to clean. I typically cook my veggies in it, although I've tried a few other items and everything has been fantastic. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Air Baby BIG IN SIZE, small amount cooks
reviews.reviewText: My biggest regret about our DASH COMPACT AIR FRYER is that it is too small for two people. I thought the size would be convenient in our motorhome but it does not cook enough for the two of us. It only fries one good-sized piece of chicken at a time so it takes too long to cook dinner. We only tried it once and were not impressed at all. However, it worked perfectly, as was intended. We should have bought one size bigger at least. We are dieting and like the taste of fried food without the grease, but missed the crunchy coating on our chicken.
Enjoyed using this for everything from chicken to corn on the cob. My return time ended on Aug 1st and here it is the 13th and the heating element has died!

reviews.reviewTitle: Broke in less than a month!
reviews.reviewText: Don't buy it! Handle broke off in less than a month. Plastic stripped where the screw goes... Doubt if it is fixable. Out like 65 bucks. Don't waste your money on this one. Handle is apparently too fragile

Easy to use but it’s cooking compartment is tiny! For the price I would definitely go with something bigger. I have seen digital air fryers with bigger compartments for the same price or cheaper. This seems like a knockoff product

reviews.reviewTitle: I love it, the meats fries perfect
reviews.reviewText: I love it , the meats fries perfect ,& the France fres,perfect

reviews.reviewTitle: Food is baked rather than fried crispy
reviews.reviewText: The fryer holds a good amount and operates and washes easily, but if you want crispy homemade fries this won't do it. The fries are more baked than fried, however I still like it

I didn’t realize this was so small, yes I know it says compact. You can fit ~6 chicken wings in here, 1 large chicken breast, or 3 medium ones. I wish I had gotten a larger one so I could use a divider and make a protein and a side at the same time. I’ve also learned that the cook times in the manual are way off - you’ll over cook like crazy with them. It is really easy to clean though and the slotted tray is nice because your food doesn’t sit in grease.

I've been using this product for over a month. It works. On days when I want to cheat with fried food I plug in my Dash. It takes a little longer because you can't make large portions in a single batch, but the end result is fantastic. My only beef is I wish it was digital. The knobs are hard to see.

I loved the product until the handle fell off and Im not able to grab the hot basket to take it out :(
I contacted Dash to provide me with the parts OR where I can PURCHASE a replacement basket but nothing.... Its been 3 months, no parts, no info on where to get them. Sad.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use, but only lasted 4 months.
reviews.reviewText:
Cooks really well, and is really easy to use, however it is mostly cheap plastic. Within the first 2 months the handle broke off completely and most of the plastic bits inside broke off as well. I took the basket apart and got everything put back together with heat resistant glue so it was useable again. Then 2 months after that, it just stopped working. I took it all apart and have concluded it's the micro switch that transfers power, but it's not worth trying to order one and replace it.

Some relatives ordered the same one, and theirs also lasted only 4 months before it just stopped turning on.

I have had this product for 10 months. After the first few months, the rub guards on the grill fell off and I wrote the company and they no longer had extra rubbers for the grill part and told me to be careful using it. Well, then the handle got loose and I managed to tighten it up but after a few months, it got loose again. Just today I was cooking spring rolls in it and when I went to remove them from the unit, it all fell apart and fell on the ground. It even dented the basket. Not a good deal unless you like to replace it every 6-8 months

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy cleanup for one of my favorite appliances
reviews.reviewText: This is probably one of my favorite cooking appliances. I cook steak, salmon, pork, burgers and all come out super nice and moist. Veggies are delicious too! I cook just the right amount of food. Took a little time to learn exact temperature and cooking time for each portion, but absolutely worth it!

I just got it today. It is pretty easy to figure out. The dial on top is for temperature and the one on the front is the timer. The first thing I tried was a frozen package of breaded okra. It took a while as I played with time and temperature trying not to have a burnt mess. It turned out well. Next, I tried the Seasoned Chickpea recipe from the book that came with it. I look forward to trying different things in the future including French fries and onion rings.

reviews.reviewTitle: The color is amazing and what drew me to this air fryer
reviews.reviewText: The color is amazing and what drew me to this air fryer! I’m so glad I gave it a try. We don’t fry very often, so the size is perfect for our family and our needs! In 10 minutes I can change up our normal side recipes. Definitely a keeper!

I love this air fryer! Being a single person, this fryer works wonderfully on scaled down meals and cooks my food perfectly! This saves me from heating up my oven for small portions and reduces my cost with my electric bill. A complete win!

reviews.reviewTitle: works great the wife loves it great for us only the ...
reviews.reviewText:
works great the wife loves it great for us only the two of us ... so the small capacity is perfect for us the others we're just to much
the fries comes out great along with the other like home made pretzels ...

reviews.reviewTitle: ... talked about getting one and that turquoise is her favorite color. Still pretty big for being the compact ...
reviews.reviewText:
I bought this for my mother for Mother's Day 2018 as we have always talked about getting one and that turquoise is her favorite color.

Still pretty big for being the compact size, but cooks food well. May need to stir some foods to get a good even crisp, like hash browns, and note the food is hot coming out, but cools quickly.

Easy to figure out and decent size cord.

Only complaint is I ordered shipping a week in advancr and ended up being over a week nefore it shipped, but received a day or two after shipping out.
4 stars because I've only used it once, but it performed beautifully. Not for two or more people however. This size is best for one.

Just got this today, checked it out & it seems to be a well made, quality item. I had to try it out with our favorite weekend lunch treat...Shrimp Spring Rolls. They come frozen, eight in a box & I was able to create two layers of four, with the top layer crossing the bottom layer. Following the directions in the owner's manual, I then baked them at 390° for 13 minutes and they came out FABULOUS!!! Crisp & lightly browned outside, moist & tasty inside. So much faster & energy efficient than in the oven! Other reviewers said it had a bad smell upon first use, but I had no issues with that at all. It was a breeze to clean afterward & I could see the grease that baked out on the cooking tray & in the basket. There are only three in my family, so it's the perfect size for us. I can't wait to try something else! I'm quite pleased with this purchase & the amazingly low price I paid. I highly recommend this air fryer!

I love fried food, and wanted to get my own fryer to use at home. I debated whether to get a deep fryer or an air fryer and settled on this one since it was cheaper and healthier. For $40, it was a steal! It's a good size, fits enough food for a grown man. Food takes an average of 15-20 min depending on what you're frying. No oil needed, yet the food still tastes great. This was very important to me. It's very easy to use. Put the food in, turn on the timer and temperature, and you're cooking. You need this in your life.

I totally love this air fryer!
I use it almost every day. I am losing weight, and this has really opened up so many possibilities to make plain food fabulous!
I use it for EVERYTHING! Makes fantastic homemade chicken nuggets, "fried" vegetables, fish, roasted new potatoes....everything comes out wonderfully crispy and/or browned. It even makes a humble veggie burger into a restaurant quality meal!
I like the food so much better without all the oil that you have to use with frying or even sauteing.
It's super easy to use and to clean.
It is attractive - I have the turquoise color, and it looks good on the counter. It is very small and hardly takes up any space.
It is very convenient, and I don't have to heat up the oven or stove to just make a quick lunch.
Just a few things to think about:
The timer knob is black, and the dot to set the time is just a raised black bump. It is really hard to see when you are turning the knob. I was thinking of putting a dot of paint on there or something so I can actually see it.
Also, this fryer is very small. It only has room to cook a serving for ONE.
It's perfect if you just want to make a meal for yourself, but if you want to cook dinner for two or more, I'd recommend getting the bigger size.
Overall, this is the best little appliance! Love it!

reviews.reviewTitle: Got in July and is already broken
reviews.reviewDate: The manufacturer commented on the review below
reviews.reviewText: I loved this air fryer... until it broke. I just got it in July and have had a few problems. First the basket finish was peeling off within the first week, then the handle fell off, I fixed it but now it just won’t turn on. I loved the ease of it and it cooked food great, but the quality is just not there.

I love my air fryer! It looks exactly as pictured.
I find myself wondering.. hmm I wonder what happens if I air fry this?
I am enjoying crispy food without as much guilt. A lot of the things I eat already are interesting in air fryer. Asparagus? Awesome. Mushrooms? Why not. Even breakfast sandwiches. Who knew I'd like a cripsy biscuits?
I would recommend this for one or two people to use. It's a small basket but it's perfect for myself and can even quickly serve up friends.
I find myself experimenting with the times and temps. I haven't ruined anything yet so that's great. Starting with small incriments so I don't burn the food.
Easy to clean and sometimes I can just pour out whatever crumbs and not really have to do a full wash each time. I handwash my dishes and haven't had any problems.

I wanted a way to cook in the summer without using my oven and heating up the house. The first time I used it, I loaded it up with frozen fish patties and french fries. Took about a half an hour and had to shake a couple of times. I have learned that it is best to cook 1 item at a time. 1st the fish fillets, about 15-20 min. When finished, I would put fries in. By the time I finish the fish, the fries are ready. Fries take 10-15 min. It's winter now and I still use the air fryer. It's faster and I prefer the crispness over oven cooked. I was very disappointed that the handle came off after about 6 months after use. I wrote the company and they offered to replace the fryer with the newer model. I was surprised they would send a whole new unit rather than just the basket. When the new fryer came, I understood why. The handle design is much sturdier with a removable basket. The digital display is so much easier to read. Thanks so much Dash, this air fryer has become my favorite kitchen gadget. For single people or smaller portions of anything, you can't beat this!

reviews.reviewDate: The manufacturer commented on the review below
reviews.reviewText: This was great while it lasted. It cooked super well, however after 8 months of use the handle broke off of the basket sending my food contents all over the floor! Although my dog was thrilled to eat all of my crispy chicken, I was not pleased as I had to pull a super hot chicken nugget out of his mouth before he burned his throat from swollowing it whole. Without the handle attached to the basket, this air fryer is completely useless. Pretty disappointed as I loved using this for the past 8 months. Just not built to last apparently.

I should have expected this one. If you have an oven, skip this. More of a gimmick than anything. Yes it cooks food, but if no different than if you place that same food on an oven tray and cook it in an oven. Not to mention your oven will hold a lot more, this is small!

I also bought one for my mom, she used it once to make fries. She called me and asked if she could return it.
Save your money, use the oven.

reviews.reviewDate: The manufacturer commented on the review below
reviews.reviewText: Love that it's compact but the tray that comes with it is too cheap. After a few use, coating is starting to come off and I can't find a replacement. Tray easily rusts.

reviews.reviewTitle: Why I waited this long to buy this awesome product I don’t know! Probably going to buy ANOTHER ONE!
reviews.reviewText:
I must admit I was “skeptical” to say the least about this air fryer. Boy was I wrong! I’ve cooked everything from basic French Fries to Pork Chops in this marvelous cooking device. Only catch to this is “cooking times”. There is a “learning curve” shall we say? I’ve personally been making a list of what food, temp & time for the wide variety of things I’ve cooked in this. Kids love it for its ability to cook chicken nuggets & fries to perfection in 15 minutes. I personally was amazed at pork chops in about 18 minutes at 400 degrees - not a dried out hunk of leather! But a perfect toasted “skin” with still moist inside and delicious with the wide variety of different seasonings and coating of mustards, Parmesan cheese, etc. I’m actually looking to buy a BIGGER model now being as impressed as I am with this one.
Just remember, cooking times will vary here and there depending on what’s cooking. I’m pretty sure times & temps will vary on various models too. Clean up is a breeze as well. Also considered just buying another of this same model to have multiple cooking going on. OH! Bigger PLUS is you are NOT heating up your WHOLE kitchen in the middle of a blazing hot summer!

I have been very unhappy with this hot air cooker and hardly ever use it now. It doesn’t cook evenly and I find it impossible to cook just one serving of french fries without tne tips being over done and the center underdone even though I shake them to redistribute them as directed. It would really help to have a better recipe book also. I would not recommend this at all.

The chemical smell while cooking made me sick. I cleaned it and used it a few times. Also felt "weird" standing by it? Like feeling and electric current? I know it sounds weird but I felt it every time. Food came out ok but i returned it. Would rather just use the over

I like it a lot. It works well into cooking food crisp without oil. I will be using this a lot. I just discovered you have to circulate the food otherwise the ones in the bottom is not cooked well while the ones on top could be burnt because that's where the heating element is. It would've been helpful if this was mentioned in the brochures.

reviews.reviewerName: a girl is not no one
reviews.reviewTitle: So much better than the oven!
reviews.reviewText:
A friend had brought some chicken taquitos to a potluck that were to die for. She said she cooked them in the air-fryer. I had been hearing about an air-fryer for some time, but had never jumped on the band wagon. I didn't need another kitchen gadget. But those taquitos were tasty and I wanted more. For the price, I didn't mind playing around and testing it out. All I can say is food tastes so much better than using the exact same ingredients and popping it in the oven. Seasoned chicken breasts are fabulous. French Fries are so much healthier than deep frying and just as good as take-out with a little seasoning.
This is a little air-fryer. I can fit in two small chicken breasts or one large one. I can cut up a single large potato for the french fries. It's the perfect size for a single person serving. I like that it's not fancy. There are two knobs; 1 to set the
temp and 1 to set the timer. Personally I use a separate timer to keep me on track. Last, it doesn't heat up the kitchen.
It doesn't get hot on the outside. Obviously it gets hot on the inside and you need to let it cool before washing. Maybe someday, I'll get a larger one, but for now, this one works just fine.

reviews.reviewTitle: purchase for me, and love it
reviews.reviewText: Purchase as a deal of the day, great price so I purchased two, and two warranties. received the day it was suppose to, and I cooked french fries and fish sticks they were very crunchy, and very delicious . If I had to buy again I would purchase a bigger one, but this is great to feed two people.

Product performs its function well. However, after one trip to the dishwasher (normal setting) the finish on the handle is ruined and now extremely unsightly. The directions and ad copy for the product claim that the basket is dishwasher safe. I found this to be untrue and rated the product accordingly.

reviews.reviewTitle: Way too small and didn't cook things through
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to like this air fryer but didn't. First, it's VERY small. I wanted one that was for a single or two person household but honestly, this doesn't fit much at all. Even a single small fish filet barely fit. And since you really cannot layer most food, you'd have to cook 2-3 batches and keep each batch warm while other cooked. Even if you are cooking for one that's a hassle. Even French fries, which you can layer, didn't do well. You have to shake them partway through but there's not room for them to move when you shake the basket. It also didn't cook stuff all the way through but burned the outer layer, no matter what temperature I used. I'm not sure if it was underpowered or if mine was defective. It was very easy to clean and the sound wasn't as loud as others indicated...at least not to me. The control knob was VERY hard to read. There is a very tiny dot to show what time you put it on and if almost need a magnifying glass and super bright light to see it to adjust the time. I rarely every return items but I did return this air fryer.

Very disappointed. Though they say it is faster it takes much longer to cook. Left plenty of room in basket for air to percolate around shoe string fries with max heat setting and pre heated still takes over 50 minutes. I rarely give bad reviews, this one was just very disappointing and unlike it's description on page.

This air fryer is absolutely amazing! Both me and my mother had been wanting one and thats when i found this one. The price was better than most and the color was super cute. Despite some of the reviews saying its too small it is not. It makes a lot of food andd the food comes out perfect. We have made fries, tater tots, shrimp, mozzarella sticks, and pizza rolls so far. Its super easy to use and super easy to clean. Its not too big that it overwhelms are counter which i really like.

If you want to give air frying a try but don't want to invest a lot into it, then give this a try. It's very basic. Not digital but with knobs and the timer knob on the front side is so hard to see you need a magnifying glass. Also the pull out drawer on this model does not have a basket to lift and shake around the food halfway through as most instruction videos show, and you really need to do that or somehow turn the food over because the heat only comes from the top. You will have several fails at first, so be prepared to waste some food, but once you get the timing right (don't even bother to turn the temperature below 400) the foods that turn out best are fries or tots and chicken nuggets.

reviews.reviewTitle: Totally awesome air fryer for one person meals and snacks - just buy one now!
reviews.reviewText: I have had this for awhile now, and some days I wonder what I did before this came into my kitchen! I no longer have to turn on the big oven just to make a nice small meal for one or some yummy snacks. And this is coming from a 40+ yr old female who always made chef grade meals for the family, coming from a family of cater's and chefs. Now that the family unit has grown up and become less I only need the air fryer for quick convenience on nights it is just me for dinner and snacks. This has worked perfect every single time. The only time it didn't work - I didn't know my husband had unplugged it haha! He laughed when I said oh no I'm going to cry if this air fryer died. Then I plugged it in and the world was right again and I had a mini pizza. The color is perfect for our kitchen and I love the retro look. My fries come out perfect every time. My chicken is fully cooked and not too dry or crunchy. i would buy another one in a heartbeat!

reviews.reviewTitle: Awesome Health-Concious Way The Fry Food
reviews.reviewText: If you like the taste of fried foods, but do not care for the health risks of frying foods in the traditional way, air frying is the way to go. This air fryer from Dash is awesome. My wife and I have always wanted to try an air fryer, and when we got this one, we have not looked back. We make oven fries very often, but they are not crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside. However, with an air fryer and twenty minutes to spare, you can have restaurant-grade fries that have the crispy outside/juicy inside. Easy to clean-up and store the fryer. Five stars all the way!

reviews.reviewTitle: Works fine after practice, but Timing and Heating is off!
reviews.reviewText:
The machine works well, but beware of the timing and heating! I set it for 5 mins to preheat and it dinged and stopped after less than 3 minutes. Curious, I set it for 10 mins and set my phone. The fryer stopped after less than 7 mins. Also, it "cooks hot"...the picture is of bacon cooked at the recommended temp and for just *half* the time stated in the accompanying recipe book. Crispy!

However, I have played with it enough where I will give it 4 stars. You just have to know it cooks VERY hot so check your food often and use lower temps. Also, reply on a phone or other timer and not the device. It does work well, just watch for overcooking and the lousy timer. I have gotten used to it and do use it almost everyday and enjoy it. Just beware of overcooking. And know that the machine and surroundings area do get hot as well...keep clear of other devices when using (the booklet says 4 inches) and it is NOT at all child friendly due to the heat (or pet friendly....my cat wanted to cuddle up for the warm air massage....)

reviews.reviewTitle: Good way to get your veggies
reviews.reviewText: It's a brilliant, no fail method to making carmalized sweet potato cubes. Not so great for fries. It's a fast way to make tasty veggies or at least that's how I've been using it.

I've only had this a couple of weeks but everything I've made has turned out great. Perfect size for my one person household. I wish the timer was easier to read because I have to use a magnifier to see the teeny tiny numbers or set a separate timer. I'm a bit concerned about the fact the cord gets hot after only a few minutes so I'm keeping close tabs on it and have it plugged into a surge protector and on a non combustible mat just in case.

reviews.reviewDate: The manufacturer commented on the review below
reviews.reviewText: Handle broke off while washing

I wanted an air fryer that could make enough for just one or two people and this is great for that. It takes me a bit to find out how long to leave things in but i'm getting the hang of it. So far everything I have put in comes out nice and crispy and I'm loving it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Be honest with what you want before you buy for yourself.
reviews.reviewText: Hated it so much I gave it away. Taste is not the same as oil. That’s a consideration. If you want to taste a little grease this isn’t the thing for you. I honestly hated it so much I did not give it a chance. But I know what I want. When I want fried stuff I want fried stuff, not air dried stuff. Be honest with yourself before you buy. Lol I’m sure it has great uses. One thing I can say is packaging and presentation were excellent. It has a little recipe booklet included. Cute little machine w small footprint on your counter top. Great for 20-somethings or newly marrieds.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great for first time air fryer users
reviews.reviewText: This is my first air fryer. I bought it because of the price & I haven't regretted it. Been using it for a few months and I feel it does what its supposed to do. It has a small capacity, I can fit in 2 medium sized chicken breasts so now I am thinking of purchasing a larger one. I also might prefer a digital air fryer but this really is a good buy if you're first trying an air fryer to see if you will like it or not. Would be great for dorm rooms or single people who don't want leftovers.

reviews.reviewTitle: Can’t Return!!!! I’m trying to return this because it buns food rather than fries it
reviews.reviewText: Can’t Return!!!! I’m trying to return this because in their buns food rather than fries it but I Amazon set up is not letting me return it. If Amazon return section would let me return it, I would not be making this poor comment . This does not air fry, this machine burns food! If I wanted to burn my food I would use the grill and watch it carefully.

First things first- I don't mess with oil- been burned too many times. So after all the hype died down, I noticed this affordable and well reviewed unit in a cooking blog. Received it last Friday and had some mozzarella sticks all ready to be cooked up. this little machine is cute and doesn’t take up a ton of counter space. it “fries” things pretty good. does frozen foods very well but is EXCELLENT at reheating food. I discovered tonite that a Celeste pizza for one fits inside PERFECTLY!!!! The price was right, and it doesn’t turn your kitchen into an inferno. I really like it

I love this air fryer, not sure what other people have been cooking in it to have a bad experience. This little guy cooks chicken so well it leaves it so crispy and juicy. I personally can’t stand day old chicken in any form till I got this air fryer. Great price point not to much counter space. Mine lives on top of the refrigerator easy to clean. It’s great for two people, wouldn’t recommend it for a family of four.

It’s smaller than I expected. I can cook one chicken breast at a time. Wishing I’d gotten one that at least cooked two at a time. This also works well and makes the outside dry and crunchy. The inside stays juicy which is cool if you like meat that way. I’m weird and like my meat kinda dry but it’s good enough and I eat stuff out of it often. Doesn’t dehydrate at all which is kinda what I wanted too.

reviews.reviewDate: The manufacturer commented on the review below
reviews.reviewText: This is the 2nd one I've ordered. The first the fan didn't work from the beginning, Amazon took it back. I reordered on just like it, and now the fan doesn't work. It has been 5 months, and it is not used regularly. Stay away from, the fan seems to be weak.

reviews.reviewTitle: Surprisingly great food quality! Perfect size for one or two people
reviews.reviewText: I have been really satisfied with the quality of food coming out of this air fryer. It’s super simple to use and while it’s never going to be exactly the same as oil fried food, people usually can’t tell when I show them. The only reason it doesn’t get 5 stars from me is because the coating on the base plate started coming off after only a few uses. I’ve used mine many many times. The coating is still about 97% intact, but the fact that any comes off doesn’t really strike me as 5-star material. I never use metal utensils or put it in the dishwasher either.
Great for the first couple of uses before the nonstick started to chip. Followed the directions, and used nonstick safe utensils but it still started chipping after 2-3 uses.

reviews.reviewTitle: Only good in making hot dogs and dehydrating fruit
reviews.reviewText: This air fryer burnt every single piece of food put into it. French fries taste like pieces of sticks. Hamburgers are bloody until they're overcooked. The only thing this is good for is cooking hot dogs and dehydrating fruits. If you plan to make meals or french fries I strongly recommend that you use your conventional oven instead of this little piece of junk. The only redeeming quality of this product is it is easy to clean. Another big negative about this product is the rubber stoppers are easily removed and lost. If I haven't lost the river Stoppers I would return the product. Since I can't return it I might as well keep using it to make hot dogs at least until I get my money's worth out of it.

I love this little machine! It’s the perfect size for my little family. The foods come out crispy just like pan frying. Such a great, healthier alternative!

Super easy to use, set the temperature, then set the timer. The heating element turns off when you remove the tray, but the timer keeps going. Once you’re done using it, the whole tray and insert are both dishwasher safe for super easy clean up!

reviews.reviewTitle: Don't know how I lived without an air fryer.
reviews.reviewText: I was not sure if I really wanted an air fryer but it came in aqua.. so I had NO choice! Now that I have it... I love it. Things that I used to put into my toaster oven (that took 10 to 15 minutes to cook/heat up) only takes a few minutes in my air fryer. It is small but it's just for me and it fits perfectly on my countertop.

reviews.reviewTitle: great color, they seem to like it No instruction ...
reviews.reviewText:
I bought this for a Christmas gift
Really cute, great color, they seem to like it
No instruction manual included though, i found that it is downloadable with a pdf under description of item

We have a small home with a small kitchen, and the last thing we need is another gadget sitting on the counter. But I am trying to eat healthier and use less fat and oil. So, we tried it out. It makes absolutely delicious meats - chicken, pork, fish -- come out nicely cooked, tender and juicy. I use it every day to fry up some hash browns for breakfast. Just a light spritz of avocado oil provides nice texture. Do note that this is a small fryer. We can do three chicken breasts in it, but that is about the limit. It is good for a single person or a couple with modest appetite, but if you have a family, go with the larger one.

reviews.reviewTitle: Air Fryer? More like Air Fire!
reviews.reviewText: I was happy with this item for the first few weeks I had it and used it several times. The last time I used it, however, it caught on fire! I'm unsure if it was a defective item but the flames required the use of our fire extinguisher. Amazon offered to replace the item (no thanks) and then quickly gave me the requested refund instead.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product, clearer times for items would better
reviews.reviewText: This thing is great for making good food during the summer when you don't want to turn on the oven. We liked how small it was, but some people want bigger. Simple and easy to use. A little muggy on how to be on target for heating, sometimes you don't do enough, sometimes you do a little too much. But overall great product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works as hoped and I'm totally happy with purcahse.
reviews.reviewText:
Item arrived on time and was packaged quite nicely. I've only used it three times thus far, but it's done a great job of cooking items (shrimp, onion rings, chicken strips, frozen hash browns) both quickly and thoroughly. I'm completely happy with the fryer.

Only three minor negatives: 1) It did let off some rather unpleasant electrical smells on the first couple of uses. At first it smelled like burning wiring or something, but it has diminished to almost nil with additional use. It did not affect the taste of the food., 2) The timer knob and scale is very difficult for my aging eyes to read. First off the print is minuscule on the scale and secondly the knob has nothing other than a little molded dot in the black plastic. I'd suggest a white dot on the knob for contrast (I'll probably do that to mine). If your eyes are good, or there's lots of light this probably isn't a concern., 3) What color is it? Depending on ambient light and the angle you view it at, this unit is sometimes truly turquoise but other times mint green. The only importance or consideration I gave to the color is the price of the unit (this color was considerably less expensive). Still, it's quite attractive regardless of the color.

Edited 9/12/18: As a followup and having used the fryer a lot I'm overall quite pleased. Only two new observations: 1) The weird electrical smell took longer to go away than I originally thought or hoped, and 2) Foods have begun to stick to the non-stick insert (despite having only been washed with a sponge and detergent + water) This can be reduced by spraying a little oil on it prior to cooking but that does diminish the point to it a bit.

This item worked well for about 3-4 months. I used it a few times a week. I was disappointed to see that it stopped working after just a few months. I guess you pay for what you get. I loved using the air fryer so I've opted to purchase a better brand.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good flavor and easy but too hard to clean and too small
reviews.reviewText: I had this for about a year. The grate was so hard to clean. It worked well, but I wish I would have bought a larger one. Because it was so hard to clean I finally started putting the whole thing in the dishwasher. After I used it in the dishwasher about four times the entire basket fell apart. Apparently it is not dishwasher safe. Also, the titanium coating came off. I would not buy another one. I will buy a different brand. This was good as long as you don't make sticky Foods in it. But the bacon it made was so delicious that I just couldn't help myself.

Very simple to use. I would experiment/practice to see it can and can't do. It's good to have a wooden or silicone spatula to give cooking items a turn every 5 or 10 minutes for more even cooking. We bought a second to give as a gift. The 1.2 liters would make 2 servings of tots, fries, garlic mushrooms, cinnamon apples, etc. We just bought a 3.7 liter machine for when there is more than the 2 of us. We love it. We use ours 10:1 over our instant pot.
The nonstick coating is peeling off after only a few uses.

I love this thing. Best french fries I have ever made with no muss or fuss. I made fried chicken thighs the other day and they turned out crispy on the outside and very moist on the inside. The only 'con' is that it's difficult to see the timer setting. There is just a little black tic on a black knob. I painted it white and all is now good.

After all the hype about air fryers, I expected better flavor and different textures...I could not manage to get either from this fryer and gave it to a person who enjoys the soggy french fries she's getting....maybe we just don't know how to use it correctly, even following directions exactly. Will stick to oven frying, but it was worth trying...it's just not for me.

This is a great little kitchen appliance! It does well with prepackaged frozen foods like fish sticks and chicken patties, but I've also had success with coconut shrimp and fresh asparagus. I think this a good size for singles, couples or small families; otherwise, you'll be making lots of batches. I'm excited to see what else I can cook in it.

I like this air fryer because it is easy to use and easy to clean. It cooks only small amount -- enough for one person-- maybe two. I have mostly been cooking organic frozen potatoes in it. Making onion ring was quite a mess -- three bowls were required. However as I go along, I find more to cook in it -- boneless pork chops, chicken breast, etc. The recipe book is almost useless and that is a big mistake the manufacturer made -- not providing a better cookbook. I would buy this again to cook for one, for some people it may be cook enough for two.

This fyer is good however, it is a bit small but i worked with it. However, after using it twice, the handle on the pan broke off. And we werent even even pulling it out or pushing it in hard. So now we have a fyer with no handle that we cant use.

reviews.reviewDate: The manufacturer commented on the review below
reviews.reviewText: I don’t know if I got a defective product but it stopped working completely after using it twice in the past 6 months or so.

This air fryer is a perfect size for one person, which is all I needed. It perfectly air-fries all my foods and therefore, saves calories without sacrificing flavor. Air fried foods come out perfectly crisp.
My only complaint, and why I gave the "easy to use" only 4 stars: The timer doesn't feel very accurate. It's a dial, and sometimes it doesn't start timing unless I dial it up more than 3 minutes or so. The timer would be better if it were digital. But at the same time, you can't go wrong with this price if you just want an inexpensive little air fryer that does the job.

reviews.reviewTitle: To have my handle working properly
reviews.reviewText:
Just received my air fryer the other day, tryed it for frist time today.
Fried very well.
The problem is handle came off as soon as I tryed to open the basket after timer went off.
Think I can fix it when it cools down by removing the screw that holds basket to housing but if can’t will be
very very upset.
Don’t want to have to use table knife every time have to open blessed thing

We love this lil machine. We tried several brands and sizes but for our use this was perfect. My teens love it for easy snack making and i love how easy it is for them to clean up. They just rinse with hot water or toss in dishwasher the drawer. The price was great too way below more expensive models I had bought and returned. It’s definitely small sized so don’t expect too make a full meal.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's not about the product this time, it's about the shipping
reviews.reviewText:
I specifically placed this order with a "non-descriptive" package on top of the item box, so the nature of the delivery would not be out in the open. The Box had only a sticker on top of the image, there was no additional "non-descriptive" box for my package, and the delivery came in after 8 PM. This could have been a horrible case of package theft because the product (a RED air fryer) was out on display on the box at a very dark time of the day. I am certainly not happy about this, the delivery person just handed my box to the person smoking outside (luckily it was one of the people who live in the hose) without asking if the smoker lived in the residence where the package was to be delivered
Alas, the product arrived fine and so far works well (only used it once). I hope this issue does not happen to anyone else.

Dash's 1.2 quart Air Fryer is the perfect size for one person. It's easy to use, but definitely read the Owner's Guide as soon as you get it. The guide also includes some very easy and varied recipes. And what a great way to reheat leftovers that you want to be crispy! Cleaning was a piece of cake, too! I later purchased an accessory set that included a raised rack that made using the air fryer even easier!

Love this little thing! It makes killer grilled cheese, toasts my leftover fries back to life, crisps up chicken wings, literally does it all! The plate inside the little tray is easy to remove and wash and the tray itself is not hard to handwash. Pleasantly short little ding when it's done, about as loud as your average microwave, and let's be honest - it's cute. The only thing I don't like is that over time the little tray did stop holding itself up (for a convection like reheating) and just slides to the bottom now, but that doesn't by any means kill the functionality of the oven.

reviews.reviewTitle: Be sure to flip everything over and cook long enough and it’s pretty good
reviews.reviewText: Does the job but it takes a while. You can’t just throw something in there and expect it to air fry on its own. You have to be sure to use small amounts and flip everything over Midway, as well was leaving the food in there a little longer And the directions say. If you do this it’s pretty good!

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to Make Small Batch of Food with Oil or Turning on the Oven
reviews.reviewText: So happy I bought this little air fryer! I bought this to make small amounts of food, such as when my son wants to make some fish sticks or other prepared frozen food items without heating up the oven. I wish there were more guidance/rule of thumb temp/cook times for frozen foods. The first time I made some frozen spring rolls I cooked them on 400 for too long. Now I basically just cook any frozen foods at 350 for about 12 or so mins. But I really am pleased with this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Snack machine for families or meal maker for a single
reviews.reviewText: I debated buying this because it is a smaller one. But I love it! I can make nuggets for my younger kid's lunch, the teens make afterschool apps like mozz sticks and I use it to make roasted veggies for my lunch. Snacks, apps and small meals is what this is for if you have a bigger family. If I was single I would use this all the time for personal meals. Crispier than the oven but not quite as good as fried.

reviews.reviewDate: The manufacturer commented on the review below
reviews.reviewText: The top edge of the basket started melting on 2nd use. Makes a terrible burning plastic smell.

reviews.reviewTitle: Dash Air Fryer is the Perfect Alternative to Oil Fried Foods
reviews.reviewText: I’m thrilled with the Dash Air Fryer! A perfect healthy alternative to frying with oil. I couldn’t believe how delicious my fish turned out!

reviews.reviewDate: The manufacturer commented on the review below
reviews.reviewText: The heating element stopped working about 6 months after I bought this. The knob would turn tonset the timer but would not heat up and the heat indicator lights would not come on. Started working out of the blue a few days later and now I’m having the same problem. Been trying for weeks to get it to work but nothing. Waste of money for only 6 months of use! Now I’m passed the return window and have an item that doesn’t work!

HOW CAN I GET REPLACEMENT FOR GRATE INSIDE OF BASKET?
I have made steak, chicken, salmon, veggies in this unit. Everything came out great. And it is so easy. Put it in set temperature and timer and when it dings you eat. You can turn the meat in middle of cooking, or not. This unit is smaller than the standard units. Just what I was looking for. Looks good on counter and does not take too much room, especially if you have a small kitchen.

I was really excited to use this air fryer, but the first time I used it (and many subsequent times afterwards) the handle fell off of the tray when I removed it to take the food out. The handle and the tray is held together by one measly screw that I'm stuck reattaching constantly, which is pretty annoying when it's hot and the food needs to cook further. Plus, this is super small - I mostly cook for one person, but it's still kinda small if you want something to be crispy all around.

Oh man, one of the best upgrades to my kitchen for sure. The ONLY downside to it that I've found after around 6 months of ownership is that the oil stains on the side of the basin that show up over time are uncleanable. I have literally tried the industries most powerful grease removers in concert with steel brushes and those oil spots still remain baked onto the sides of the pot-like interior.

But oh man.... Making your own fried foods at home is incredible and takes literally minutes to cook. Unlike a regular oven, you don't need to preheat this. You just plop your food in (stacked jenga block style if there's a lot), and cook for under 10 mins and it's ready.

Loved this air fryer. I’ve used others and not all of them are made equal, this one doesn’t leave foods dry. However about six months after purchasing it it stopped working, nothing happened to it it just wont work. Pretty disappointed with how little it lasted.

Was low key a little disappointed. Have another air fryer, larger one, not same brand, and absolutely love that one.

This one I feel doesn’t look the food as well/fast.

It works for traveling because of the size so it’ll do since I’ll only have to use it once in a while

reviews.reviewTitle: A fast way to whip up a meal for one or two people.
reviews.reviewText: This is my first experience with an air fryer and it has been great. I put chicken nuggets and French fries in together and as long as you monitor them and shake them up a few times during the cooking process, they cook evenly and taste great. All in about 15 minutes at 390 degrees. No need to preheat the oven for 10 minutes. this thing preheats in 30 seconds. The clean up is super easy. nothing sticks to the cooking basket. I love this thing.

reviews.reviewTitle: Only for very small quantities, and it's not that good
reviews.reviewText: There are probably good air fryers on the market, but this isn't one of them. It seems underpowered and food often turns out limp and dry rather than crisp. It only cooks small quantities of food, so I wouldn't use it for more than 1 person.

Prior to having this air fryer, I didn’t fry things a lot because grease is really annoying to clean up; I would bake the items, which took forever to get food crispy. This air fryer is super easy to use and gets everything crispy quickly. It’s easy to clean as well - I throw the detachable parts in the dishwasher.

I've used my air fryer twice now and was pleasantly surprised by how well it cooked the fries I made. It cooks them fast and if you follow the directions that are provided in the box, the food will turn out right. The directions are easy to understand, the fryer comes with recipes too, and it is easy to clean. I hope it ends up holding up and being sturdy, because I love the color (and the price)!

I hate cooking but since I’m a SAHM I have to do it every day.... this has completely changed my life !!!! So easy to cook with this ! I’ve ised it for salmon, chicken drumsticks, burger patties and I’m so happy with the results. for French fries & sweet potatoe fríes I don’t like it that much...but for the rest is awesome 👏👏👏👏

reviews.reviewTitle: Great for cooking just about anything!
reviews.reviewText: I love the color and the performance of this little air fryer. The capacity is small and that would be my only complaint. Air fryers are just big in general and the space to fry something is a lot smaller than the appliance it's self. Great for one person or maybe two people but you definitely need something larger for a family. I really don't actually fry much with the fryer but I use it to cook greens and vegetables and it always turns out great. Also tofu and tempeh work really well!

This item is a life saver. On hot days when I do t want to turn on the oven, I just pop items in the air fryer. Its fast, convenient, and cute. I have made chicken wings, jalapeno poppers, pizza rolls, chicken thighs, vegetables, and much more. It's very versatile. This would be perfect for a college dorm or a single person.

Please pay attention to description. This is compact...one person item.

Really good and convenient. It’s better than other air fryers if you don’t want to take up too much space in your kitchen or if you don’t have too much space to store it in. Good for one person. Unfortunately it’s not too big for you to be able to cook multiple pieces of meat at the same time (depends on the meat, of course—example, two pork chops are kind of tight). Simplifies your life, especially if you’re busy or in a hurry and don’t have time or want to be checking up on your food the whole time.
It has been one month, drip tray is starting to flake off. I have only ever hand washed this with a soft cloth. Concerned... Woyld like a replacement for tray.
We tried french fries from fresh potatoes and they really didn't turn out too good. Not browned and unevenly cooked. I had high hopes to take out the oil in frying for hubby. He hated them.

reviews.reviewDate: The manufacturer commented on the review below
reviews.reviewText: Did not cook evenly. I shook it multiple times in between but it still did not cook evenly. Very dissapointed.

reviews.reviewTitle: Oversized unit with Convection technology with small food output
reviews.reviewText: Mine was damaged as the basket track was misaligned & I had to return. I still would have returned this after realizing this machine is nothing more than “Convection Oven” technology! It has a heat plate with a fan in an oversized unit & an extremely small food output!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Spend a bit more and get a better product
reviews.reviewText: Difficult to close. Also, I easily burned my hand on the back of the unit trying to push in the basket

This fryer is cute but is too small for two people. At least we think it would be if we could ever get anything edible out of it. We keep trying to fry things but the most it seems to do is bake. Following directions explicitly everything turns out nearly raw. We have to cook things far longer than the book says to get it to bake. Frying simply doesn't happen.
Works as expected. The chemical smell it gave off at first was awful. it's not too bad now that it has heated several times.

reviews.reviewTitle: A pretty good way to introduce yourself to dry frying.
reviews.reviewText: It's small.. no doubt about that.. but its very good. I've made a few rounds of frozen fries to get an idea of how hot and how long to "fry" and I've found that it is pretty much on the nose compared to oven temperature. It's easy, just stick a hot pocket or whatever in there and walk away, it will ring you when it's done. Things are nice and crispy but not greasy, which is good for you, but there a curve to get over because who doesn't like greasy fried foods?. As I said, its a nice way to learn about dry frying. (I got mine on prime day for $20, so that was a great time to jump in.)
Lo compre hace 2 meses y me ha funcionado perfecto. Comidas mas sanas y en menos tiempo, el tama;o es peque;o no creo que sirva para una familia

The item is packaged well, I though due to the price it was Chinese and likely sketchy but professional packaging. it is well built, it does take a few minutes to warm up and then i add the items to cook. clean up is good. so far i have no qualms. it does what it is intended. Not exactly like deep fried flavor but tastes good

really easy to use!!!

Its great! all freeze things that you fry normal will be great, take in mind the time, what usually takes 2-3 minutes to fry in an ordinary fryer will take up to 20 minutes here, but is healthy!!!... im not pretty sure to use it in some fresh food, I tried with some vegetables and sweet potato and I didn't like de flavor and texture, but I think I have to practice a little bit more

Good for 1-2 people. Rather slim and cute one compare to most air-fryer. Tried French fries, good, a bit over cooked, next time, need shorten the time. But that's rather my own fault. It's very straight forward, easy to use.

This is the perfect size for me and works amazingly. I’m able to cook up quick lunches for my toddler without turning on the oven and have also discovered a love of chicken drumsticks, lol!

It is super simple to use (kind of hard to mess up), and you can find a few recipe videos using this exact model on YouTube.

I'm new to air fryers and didn't want to commit to a huge one given our counter space is pretty small. But when this showed up in a Daily Deal type of promotion, I jumped at the chance to get one and it's perfect for very small batches. Maybe when I get better with it, I'll move up to the bigger version but for our needs, it's just right.

reviews.reviewTitle: They tasted more like cinnamon sugar mall pretzels
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my husband and I to use. It would take multiple batches to cook for a larger family. So far I have only made cinnamon sugar donuts in it and it worked well. They tasted more like cinnamon sugar mall pretzels, but that's ok! I will be trying out buffalo wings in it this week!

I never wanted an air fryer because I do not like how big the unit is and I wanted it to fit in a cabinet.
This is the perfect size for me and my family. I made fry plantains in it, warmed up my pork belly (bacon), my son chicken nuggets. Perfect everytime. No oily smell in the house.
I lined with foil liners to make clean up even easier.

reviews.reviewTitle: Arrived in good condition, setup was easy, performed as expected
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a present for my mom so she can use it at her work. She normally just uses a microwave to cook or reheat her food, and she HATES it. Buying this as a Christmas present was an incredibly good choice. The air fryer has a very small form factor yet a generously sized basket, GREAT price for the product, and it is perfect for a quick, easy and healthy cook!

This thing is perfect for my home! I don’t have a ton of space to store large kitchen appliances so for the price and size, it’s perfect for me. I can cook a batch of food for 2 and not worry about overcrowding. They state that you don’t need to use oil, but I found that using a small spritz of EVO spray, it crisps everything up perfectly! I will be purchasing more dash products in the future when we upgrade to a larger home! The aqua color is the cherry on top of this modern style air fryer!

I absolutely LOVE this air fryer. I cook almost everything I can in it. It makes everything crispy and all around. Fries and wings come out soooo good. All my fried foods taste way better in this. I definitely recommend anyone looking for an air fryer to look no further. The price is perfect, the look is awesome in my home, and the food comes out perfect!

reviews.reviewTitle: The non stick coating wears off in one month.
reviews.reviewText: One month and one week, just a few days beyond the Amazon return date, the non stick coating on the basket chips off. The finish on the exterior also is wearing off. I was pleased with it until now.it also doesn’t heat as well as it did. I have not used it more than maybe three times a week at very short intervals. Another reviewer had a similar experience.

So far this gift for my boyfriend has been well received. We’ve tried a couple things with it, and enjoyed using it. It’s a tad bit small, and I could’ve sized up, but that’s okay. This is the first aid fryer, so we’ll get the hang of it after awhile, as the food has been somewhat bland.

reviews.reviewTitle: Use a parchment paper inside and it stays clean.
reviews.reviewText: Gift for my daughter. She uses it nearly everyday. Uses Parchment paper inside each time, never had to wash it then.

I adore this little version of the bigger air fryer. I use it almost daily for chicken nugget for the kids. I also use it to reheat my leftovers of seafood , onion rings, ect., It would make great chicken wings too but hubby won't eat those. The possibilities are endless.

I had an Air Fryer years ago when they first came out and absolutely hated it. It took up too much counter space and had a wire basket that food stuck to and I found hard to clean. Now the Dash Compact is all together better. It’s smaller and there is no wire basket but a nonstick one that seems to do the job. I’m glad I decided to revisit Air Fryers and so far I’m very pleased with the Dash.

reviews.reviewTitle: You will not miss fried food—promise!!
reviews.reviewText: I love this air fryer...I think I’ve used it nearly every day since I got it...I’ve cooked wings twice, a pork chop, chicken tenders, pizza, okra...it’s so versatile & I have zero complaints so far...I have the small one but it is the perfect size for one person...to give you an idea, I was able to cook 10 chicken drumettes at one time...if you love fried food but don’t NEED the fried food, you will love it!
Where has this little guy been my whole life?! It’s so cute and easy to use.
We purchased the fryer a year ago and the handle broke off. We didn’t use the it entire year as we were moving and it was in storage for six months.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good product and quality. A little small but does the trick.
reviews.reviewText: Pretty good. Its a little small but the volume is pretty decent. Need to get the hang of this cause we can easily burn the food. One con is that the red base loses color when used in a dishwasher and the handle seems a little loose.
it worked fine for about 9 months, then last night, it suddenly stopped working. No heat at all. Just died. I now will be buying another brand.

I don't feel like this product gets hot enough even with reheating you have to flip everything twice & cook twice as long. Plus you can only do a single layer at a time or it doesn't cook thoroughly. I would recommend splurging on a better fryer that's not so cheap

Literally bought this 3 months ago and its already not working ... No idea what is wrong but it will not heat up the timer is the only thing that works on it.
What a waste! if you are considering this DONT spend some extra money and buy something else a little more reliable that will last longer than 3 months

I am enjoying this appliance...I do wish I'd decided on a larger model as it offers more variety. BUT the main reason for this review is to warn folks about the little rubber tip protectors found on the removable tray... these can fall off... found one one day in the food I'd prepped...choking hazard!

So I just got this bad boy in today and it is amazing. Easy to use and the food comes out crispy, crunchy and not greasy! The clean up is so easy too and it’s a bit bigger than a blender so fits on my counter! I love it!!! Best purchase ever my toddler loves his fries and tenders!
Very nice air fryer for a single person or two just perfect! Cook everything, fry everything and warm everything love it <3

so, my experience so far is that this product struggles with airflow. the things on the bottom are mushy and the things on the top are burnt. also, i don't need this thing to be round. it makes putting the tray in a snug fashion a chore.

Some dislikes the timer round knob is smooth try turning it when your fingers are wet. Ally the off positition is only a miniscule indent. I had to mark it with a silver felt pen. Also the slide in draw doesn't slide in easily and jams,BUT the frier works, so far, very well and is well worth the low price we paid for it.

I love this. When cooking for one or two I don't need to use the oven. Cost-saving and it's super easy to clean up. Use it two or three times a week. Also provides an easy way to warm up left overs--especially fried fish/chicken. Love it.

Living in a small apartment, I really try to limit the amount of kitchen stuff I have. That said, this thing has become absolutely essential for me. It's easy to make small portions of something really fast. Perfect for doing side dishes while your stove top is busy. I like to make bagels, Brussels sprouts, and fries.

After hearing so many talk about loving these I decided to get one... it isn’t at all as I was hoping. It doesn’t cook much at a time so unless your cooking for one your not saving time and it just doesn’t get things crunchy or close. No thanks

I love this little thing. It’s compact enough to keep out on my counter but has decent cooking power for its size. Now because it is compact, you can’t expect to be making a lot all at once but it’s fine for me since I mainly just cook for myself. Works well. The shipping was kind of an issue, it got returned to the sender and I ended up waiting twice as long for it but we’ll worth the wait in my opinion. I would recommend it.
Wish I had bought this sooner. Makes great french-fries and eggrolls . Wish they had accessories for this model. It's fine for one or two people.

LOVE LOVE LOVE.... just the right size for my husband and me. It will be nice not to heat the oven in the summer. I can make one or two servings easily and it is fairly fast. Love the color and would definitely purchase again.

This quickly becomes one of my favorite kitchen machine. I like the color (aqua), the size not taking too much space. It heats up quickly and does the job. Inside it has a grid to serve as a platform, along with the bucket on the bottom are both coated so they are pretty easy to clean.

I bought this little fryer for my niece and she loves it. She says it one of the best gifts ever. It is a great way to fix a healthy, low fat meal in just a few minutes. She likes the fact that she is able to have crispy fried foods without the calories.

reviews.reviewTitle: It is small..great for one person possible two.
reviews.reviewText: I like the size since I'm cooking for one. However didn't realize it doesn't have a baking pan with it and many of my recipes call for a baking pan. Wish recipe book contained more recipes. Hamburger, pork chop, french fries were delicious. Chicken not so good but will try wings next time also leave skin on chicken so it doesn't dry out. Very easy cleanup is a plus. Also bought Dash mini waffle maker and love it. Makes waffle in approx. 2 minutes and it was delicious.

reviews.reviewTitle: No apto para pedidos desde el exterior, no hay garantías al usuario
reviews.reviewText: El producto llegó deteriorado por mal ensamblaje de manufactura de fábrica, a pesar de fotografías y reclamos estos no fueron atendidos adecuadamente, la garantía no respalda a productos que van fuera del país, perdiendo dinero y tiempo de espera, ya que no es posible hacer devoluciones. No recomendable, es perjudicial, sin garantías ni respaldo alguno para el consumidor. Muy mala opción

Incredible product. Got a small one because it's just me and the chicken cooked perfectly. Not dry, nice and crispy. I only used seasoning. Cleans easily. No excuse to eat out no more. I would recommend this.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for my Husband and I ! Makes quick sides and appetizers! No mess and make enough for 2!
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for me and my Husband! I can cook a quick side dish or appetizer! Frozen wings with some hot sauce ! Low in fat! I just pray Pam on them with hot sauce! Easy clean up, doesn’t heat up the house! Veggies etc. it’s cute and matched my coffee pot!

reviews.reviewTitle: Mom loves it; great for one person!
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my 84 year old Mom. I like the 30- minute auto “off” feature. We Review the simple instructions together; and I was with her for her first frying experience. It’s the perfect size for one person, simple to use, easy to clean.

I am in love 😍 this thing works like a charm. It’s not huge, but it’s perfect for cooking for one. I love the style, it fits in perfect with my overall retro kitchen style. Does the trick perfectly every time, it’s so quick and definitely easy to use!

I absolutely love this air fryer. Everything turns out wonderful especially chicken. And I love it is so easy to clean and take care of it. So glad I bought it and wanted to give it some time before I posted a review. I am a satisfied customer.

Such a good purchase! I will say it is small, for reference it fits maybe 4 chicken drumsticks or two crab cakes at once. But it’s super easy to use, easy to clean, and compact enough to leave on a counter! Definitely good for 1 or 2 people! We love it!

Works great, so easy and convenient to use! You can pull the drawer out at anytime to shake or turn ingredients, cooks evenly and crisps with just cooking spray or very minimal oil. Love the color and style!. Product exactly as pictured and described. Arrived quickly!

We love this! We only wish it was a little bigger. We end up having to make 2 batches. Perfect during the heatwave we are having to make the kids lunch and dinner quickly! Fits nicely on counter. Has a nice retro appearance.
Whoever invented this product is a genius! I love being able to eat fried food without the oil and mess!

I like my air fryer. It is the right size for me
I had to adjust my taste when I first got it as the food needed more spice or it was a bit tasteless. After this adjustment things are fine.
I use a pastry brush to put a little oil or butter on some foods this helps a lot. Gives a tiny bit of crispness also.

Quality machine, works great.
Only downside is, and that's the not issue with the machine, rather me. Is that it is smaller then i envisioned. When making fries i was unable to use more then one smallish potato at a time. Same with wings. You cannot layer. As only to bottom of the basket and top will be cooked. So take that into account when buying.
Super personal use only.

I wanted to get in on the air frying boom and was excited when I got mine in the mail. Heats up quick and adds great texture to all the different foods I cook. Works great on reheating chicken especially since it crisps up the skin after a night in the fridge. So no complaints. Also love the sea foam color. Highly recommended for people looking for a fryer for one or two persons households.
Not sure why they call these Friars since zero oil is involved. More like 'baker', not fryer.

It does work as advertised..so far have only done frozen items..French fries..chicken nuggets and fish sticks...it does take abit of trial and error but over all it does the job.
